item.title: Russian foreign minister: Aggression against us will be met with 'decisive response'
item.description: Moscow’s top diplomat insists Russia has no intention of attacking Europe.

item.title: 3 dead and others believed missing after flooding in rural Arizona community
item.description: Officials say three people have died and others are believed missing after flooding in a rural community in Arizona

item.title: Thieves steal $1M worth in craft whiskey from Washington distillery
item.description: Thieves have stolen 12,000 bottles of craft whiskey from Westland Distillery in a rare U.S. liquor heist

item.title: Trump asks Supreme Court to uphold restrictions he wants to impose on birthright citizenship
